about_the_game:
Need some help in grinding? With the EXP Boost Equipment, you can equip the Le Choara Hairpin to give a huge boost in EXP after each battle!

The EXP Booster Equipment include:
・Le Choara Hairpin x1　　　　

※You will have to progress the game until you can change equipment.
detailed_description:
Need some help in grinding? With the EXP Boost Equipment, you can equip the Le Choara Hairpin to give a huge boost in EXP after each battle!

The EXP Booster Equipment include:
・Le Choara Hairpin x1　　　　

※You will have to progress the game until you can change equipment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements

short_description: The EXP Booster Equipment adds the Le Choara Hairpin to the game granting the a character a large increase in experience!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
